block.p: Carolyn Elizabeth Petersen and Christopher Davis Perera were married last evening by the Rev. Paul Thompson at St. Andrews by the Sea Episcopal Church in Hyannis Port, Mass.
Mrs. Perera, 37, is the general manager of the Michael Kors shop in New York. She graduated from Bucknell.
Carolyn Elizabeth Petersen and Christopher Davis Perera were married last evening by the Rev. Paul Thompson at St. Andrews by the Sea Episcopal Church in Hyannis Port, Mass.
Mrs. Perera, 37, is the general manager of the Michael Kors shop in New York. She graduated from Bucknell.

She is the daughter of Lynn and Ronald Petersen of Wendover, England. Her father is a partner in Longbow Capital, a venture capital firm in London. Her mother is the director of sales, marketing and fund-raising at the British division of Outward Bound.

Mr. Perera, 38, runs the creative development department in New York of the American subsidiary of Leopard Films, a British television and film production company. He graduated from St. Lawrence University.

He is the son of Frederica P. D. Perera of New York and the late Phillips Perera. His mother is a professor of environmental health sciences at Columbia. His father was the founder and president of Interfin, a New York financial services company for international food businesses.

The bridegroom is the stepson of Frederick A. O. Schwarz Jr., who is the senior counsel at the Brennan Center for Justice, an advocacy organization in New York, and a great-grandson of the founder of the toy store.
